extendedInfo.description: NOTE: Time Lapse Droid is now a free app!Fulfill your time-lapse photography dreams with your Android camera! Time Lapse Droid is a fully featured camera app that aids in capturing time-lapse stills in succession. These frames can be re-assembled on your personal computer with the frame rate, music, and other effects chosen at your leisure. For a great program with which to do so, see http://www.ghacks.net/2009/09/17/turn-photo-sequences-into-time-lapse-movies/WARNING: A lot of the additional camera effects are currently experimental. They might crash for you; send me an email telling me how it happened, which may help me solve this issue.Do not exit the application through use of the back or home button while it is taking pictures. Use Menu > Safely exit process.If you find any bugs or have any suggestions, feel free to email me at didacticdev@gmail.comFEATURES:-Name your project-Choose a lapse interval-Specify duration-Choose from advanced camera settings automatically detected from your phone (includes anti-banding, color effects, flash modes, picture size, white balance, and more!)-Review free disk spaceSOON TO COME:-Start timer-Set duration by time-Geo taggingKNOWN ISSUES:- Using the phone on which I test this app for development, the 'aqua' camera effect currently freezes.

reviews.title: nice interface, but no video output
reviews.comment: Slightly more preferences/options offered than some other free apps, but no video output was a let down for this app. I also could not initally find where the app had stored the content it had saved. Would be good for automating image capture to take into other software to create a video, but image quality was not as good as other apps that I tried out.
reviews.author: A Google User
